( #{adv.targetid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.adgroupid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.expressiontype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.expression,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.bid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adv.opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

bydate,
sum(impressions) impressions, sum(clicks) clicks, sum(cost) Spend, ifnull((sum(clicks) / sum(impressions)),0) 'Click Thru Rate (CTR)', ifnull((sum(cost) / sum(clicks)),0) 'Cost Per Click (CPC)', ifnull(sum(sales),0) '7 Day Total Sales', case when ifnull(sum(cost),0) > 0 and ifnull(sum(sales),0) = 0 then 0 else ifnull((sum(cost) / sum(sales)),0) end 'Total Advertising Cost of Sales (ACoS)', ifnull((sum(sales) / sum(cost)),0) 'Total Return on Advertising Spend (RoAS)', ifnull(sum(purchases),0) '7 Day Total Orders', ifnull(sum(unitsSold),0) '7 Day Total Units', ifnull((sum(purchases) / sum(clicks)),0) '7 Day Conversion Rate', ifnull(sum(purchases) ,0) '7 Day Other SKU Units', ifnull(sum(sales),0) '7 Day Other SKU Sales' from t_amz_adv_rpt2_sd_product_targets t left join t_amz_adv_rpt2_sd_product_targets_attributed_all a on a.targetingId=t.targetId and a.bydate=t.bydate where t.profileid = #{profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.bydate <= #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.bydate >= #{fromDate,jdbcType=CHAR}
